revised_title: Influence of Atomic Grouping on Absorption in Infra-Red Spectrum of Organic Molecules
tldr: The authors conducted research on the absorption of light by organic molecules in the infra-red region of the spectrum using the photographic method. They found that different molecular groupings in organic bodies affect their absorption in the infra-red region, and that these groupings can be identified by analyzing the absorption spectra. This research helps in understanding the behavior of organic compounds and their interactions with light.
